name: 6th International Conference on Communication and Electronics Systems ICCES 2021
content: Following the consecutive success of Communication and Electronics Systems \[CES\], the conference committee is pleased to announce the 6th International Conference on Communication and Electronics Systems \[ICCES 2021\] in emerging information and communication technologies \[ICT\] and smart electronics. ICCES 2021 will be organized from PPG Institute of Technology Campus on July 8-10, 2021\. ICCES 2021 seeks potential research submissions that solicit the state-of-the-art applications, innovative methods, and analyse the unexplored and unsolved challenges to establish the relative solutions to advance the existing applications and theories of ICT & smart electronics systems. Potential researchers and authors are invites to submit their novel, unpublished papers of significant research quality that addresses the advances and challenges in the interdisciplinary areas both system theories and applications.
